mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT m.menu_name AS "menuName", m.menu_id AS "menuId", CONCAT(m.namespace,':',b.permission_code) AS "namespace", m.menu_url AS "menuUrl" , m.father_menu_id AS "fatherMenuId" FROM t_sett_ms_menu m LEFT JOIN t_sett_ms_menu_permission b ON b.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE m.namespace IS NOT NULL AND m.namespace !='' AND m.is_enable = 1 AND b.is_enable = 1 ORDER BY m.father_menu_id,m.order_index ) m WHERE m.namespace IS NOT NULL

(SELECT menu_id AS "id", father_menu_id AS "parentId", menu_name AS "name" FROM t_sett_ms_menu WHERE is_delete = 0 ORDER BY parentId ) UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT("p_", p.permission_id) AS "id", p.menu_id AS "parentId", p.permission_name AS "name" FROM t_sett_ms_menu_permission p INNER JOIN t_sett_ms_menu m ON m.menu_id = p.menu_id WHERE p.is_delete = 0 AND m.is_delete = 0
